title: Ninja Collection
synopsis: Set in modern-day Tokyo where dreams and desires are afloat, a group of ninjas called "Toukeshuu" is set to stop the spread of "darkness" that prevails in the world using ancient techniques passed down through generations.
staff: [['Umetsu, Satoshi', ['Producer']], ['Funada, Akira', ['Producer', ' Episode Director']], ['Kumamoto, Hiromu', ['Script']], ['Tsuruga, Rei', ['Script']]]
